description: The first step to any great trip is deciding where to go. This involves research, understanding the best time to visit, and aligning the destination with your budget and interests.
sentences: Consider the weather and season for your chosen destination.
Define your travel style: are you looking for relaxation, adventure, culture, or a mix?
Set a realistic budget for your trip, covering travel, accommodation, food, and activities.
Read travel blogs and watch vlogs for authentic reviews and hidden gems.
Check for any travel advisories or special entry requirements.
dos: Research the local culture and customs.
Create a flexible itinerary with a mix of planned activities and free time.
Book flights and accommodation in advance, especially during peak season.
Inform your bank about your travel plans to avoid card issues.
donts: Don't rely on a single source of information for your planning.
Avoid carrying large amounts of cash.
Don't forget to check the validity of your passport and visa requirements for international travel.
